text: @MrAndyNgo A Florida sociopath who was let out of Mar a Lago due to coronavirus concerns should be arrested and charged with committing murder due to his inept, self-serving lack of leadership and negligence, leading to countless deaths. https://t.co/5X5Vu0jwQu

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
